parameters.name: AliyunResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud resource group.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the serverless resource group. The name can be a maximum of 128 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, and underscores (\_). The name must start with a letter.

parameters.name: PaymentDurationUnit
parameters.description: The unit of the subscription duration. Valid values: Month and Year.

parameters.name: PaymentType
parameters.description: The billing method of the serverless resource group. Valid values: PrePaid and PostPaid. The value PrePaid indicates the subscription billing method, and the value PostPaid indicates the pay-as-you-go billing method.

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: The description of the serverless resource group. The description can be a maximum of 128 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, and underscores (\_).

parameters.name: Spec
parameters.description: The specifications of the serverless resource group. Unit: CU. This parameter is required only if you set the PaymentType parameter to PrePaid.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) with which the serverless resource group is associated by default.

parameters.name: VswitchId
parameters.description: The ID of the vSwitch with which the serverless resource group is associated by default.
